```{r setup}
library(ussie)
library(dplyr)
```

ussie let's you work with european football data from the engsoccerdata package by making standard tibbles for each league

```{r}
spain <- uss_make_matches(engsoccerdata::spain,"Spain")
glimpse(spain)
```
